message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"class or lesson","sentence":"他们上课。","image_prompt":"A classroom scene in a gentle soft apocalypse animation style: several children and a teacher sit together, with open books on desks, as soft morning light filters in. The blackboard has simple drawings or characters, suggesting a lesson. The outside window shows a subtly surreal landscape with muted, dreamlike colors and gentle decay (crumbling buildings, plants growing over objects), but the mood inside class is calm and focused. Anime aesthetics, soft edges, slightly pastel palette.","sentence_translation":"They have class."}
